sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"手杖"之意。
means: cane ： 多指用藤或竹制成的细长的手杖。
stick ： 普通用词，指木制的细长手杖。
staff ： 多指走路爬山时用作支持或防卫使用的长木棒。

word_mean: 探杆，导引探子：切开取石术中使用的一种导引手术刀的有沟探子

sentence.Network_en: "One thing you can never insure against is corruption among your staff."—"Agreed."
sentence.Network_cn: “永远也防不胜防的就是员工内部的贪污腐败。”——“同意。”

sentence.Network_en: A skeleton staff of 20 is being kept on.
The party has been taking on staff, including temporary organisers.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个政党一直在招募工作人员，包括临时的组织人员。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English staf (in sense 3), of Germanic origin; related to Dutch staf and German Stab

entry.tran: (一组织的)全体工作人员，全体，职员
entry.def: The staff of an organization are the people who work for it.

example.ex: The outpatient program has a staff of six people...
example.tran: 门诊部有 6 名工作人员。

entry.tran: (全体工作人员中的)部分成员
entry.def: People who are part of a particular staff are often referred to as staff .

example.ex: 10 staff were allocated to the task...
example.tran: 10名员工被分配来完成这项任务。

example.ex: He had the complete support of hospital staff.
example.tran: 他得到了医院职工的全力支持。

entry.tran: 由…担任工作人员;由…供职
entry.def: If an organization is staffed by particular people, they are the people who work for it.

example.tran: 它们的工作人员都是志愿者。

example.ex: The center is staffed with highly trained physicians...
example.tran: 该中心配备了训练有素的医生。

entry.def: A staff is a strong stick or pole.
A staff is the five lines that music is written on.

means.word_mean: 1. personnel who assist their superior in carrying out an assigned task;

sentences.sentence: "the hospital has an excellent nursing staff"
"the general relied on his staff to make routine decisions"

means.word_mean: 2. the body of teachers and administrators at a school;

sentences.sentence: "the dean addressed the letter to the entire staff of the university"

means.word_mean: 3. a strong rod or stick with a specialized utilitarian purpose;

sentences.sentence: "he walked with the help of a wooden staff"

means.word_mean: 4. building material consisting of plaster and hair; used to cover external surfaces of temporary structure (as at an exposition) or for decoration
5. a rod carried as a symbol
6. (music) the system of five horizontal lines on which the musical notes are written

sentences.sentence: "The two men staff the reception desk"

auth_sentence.content: But this has never been accepted by medical staff.
auth_sentence.res_content: But this has never been accepted by medical staff.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But this has never been accepted by medical staff.

auth_sentence.content: Staff Benda Bilili hail from the streets of Kinshasa.
auth_sentence.res_content: Staff Benda Bilili hail from the streets of Kinshasa.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Staff Benda Bilili hail from the streets of Kinshasa.

auth_sentence.content: Footage of the kits was captured by trial staff.
auth_sentence.res_content: Footage of the kits was captured by trial staff.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Footage of the kits was captured by trial staff.

Sentence.sentence: At Yorkshire Pudding, Hill says that his staff asks diners whether they would like to share their meals.
At Yorkshire Pudding, Hill says that his staff asks diners whether they would like to share their meals.
Its teaching staff consists of women only.
Its teaching staff consists of women only.
Such was the case in the early 1990s when Sears imposed a sales quota on its auto repair staff.

sentences.en: The school's teaching staff is[are] excellent.
sentences.cn: 该校的教师队伍是优秀的。

sentences.en: This company has a staff of fifty.
sentences.cn: 这家公司有五十名职员。

sentences.en: The manager fired an old staff yesterday.
sentences.cn: 经理昨天解雇了一名老职员。

sentences.en: He works at the General Staff.
He staffed my office with two secretaries.
sentences.cn: 他给我的办公室安排了两名秘书。

sentences.en: I staffed the government three years ago.
sentences.cn: 三年前我为政府工作，是名公务员。

sentences.en: He staffed ten computer operators in his firm.
sentences.cn: 他在公司里雇用了十名电脑操作员。

jushi.english: He works at the General Staff.
The school's teaching staff is/are excellent.
jushi.chinese: 该校的教师队伍是优秀的。

jushi.english: This company has a staff of fifty.
